price: 16. Or, s’ils s’étaient engagés sur la voie droite, Nous les aurions certes abreuvés d’une eau généreuse,
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
